author: Ernie Folchi
comment: How do I connect the Time Machine watchface app to my Moto 360? I had it on my phone already even before I got the Moto 360. So does that mean I have to uninstall it and install it again?

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Install Android Wear on your phone and pair it with your watch. The face will be uploaded automatically.

author: Haley Priebe
comment: It won't show up in Android Wear, so I'm not able to apply it to my watch.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hi Haley can you please drop us an email at support@seenapps.com to figure it out? Thanks

author: Lee dent
comment: Not showing in android wear.So can't apply it to watch.

author: Rajiv K
comment: Love it, it's a great conversion starter, people straight away know exactly what the watch face is, they love it that it has two different time zones too. Really love it.  Works well on my Huawei watch, no issues. Good on battery life too!
title: BRILLIANT

author: Geeky See Art
comment: It took a while to show up on my watch, but other than that, it's looks great.
title: Good app

author: David Kramer
comment: Works great, haven't changed my watch face in months
title: Fossil q founder

author: Faisel Shah
comment: Love the BTTF watch face!
title: Awesome!

author: Samuel Turner
comment: Works good, how do you change the destination time? I don't see options, and I set my alarm and that didnt change it

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hi Samuel, press and hold the face until you can see the cog below it.

title: Works good Moto 360

author: Vance Christie
comment: Not hence the 3 stars
title: Does it wrk on gear s2

author: Preston Wyatt
comment: Don't work on gear s2 fix and will rate better

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: S2 is not an Android Wear device. We can't fix that, sorry. I wish Google Play could understand this compatibility issue and stop showing all the apps that won't run on your device (which I find gorgeous by the way)

author: mal bisset
comment: Works great on moto 360 thanks

author: Erik Cho
comment: The watch face looks great its clean and simple and very easy to read. You could tell there's been careful attention paid to the scaling because one of the biggest problems you have with digital numbers in different colors in such close proximity is that it can get tricky to read at a quick glance but no problems here. Also like the fact you can set the "destination time" to a different time zone. I've got mine set to my boss's time zone so I know when he'll be signing in to work remotely :D.
title: Awesomely simple yet looks great.

author: Kevin Brasier
comment: Just had to grab this today and it does not disappoint.  The dual timezone feature is awesome and the displays look great.  The AM/PM "LEDs" are a nice touch to how it was in the movie.  OUTATIME
title: Must buy on BTTF day

author: Jim Y
comment: This face was perfect as it was. There was just one little personal tweak that I wanted and the developer replied to my email quickly and actually added the feature. Many thanks to you for that. Beautiful watch face.
title: 5 star for service alone

author: Carlos Barragan
comment: Ahhhh geeking out!

author: Andrew Mattie
comment: Happy BTTF Day!

author: Raphael Silva
comment: Really good

author: Beau Lujan
comment: Love it.

author: Angel Rodriguez
comment: Does this even  work

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Angel. It's a watch face that gets installed via Android Wear. If you have trouble using it, please reach out to support@seenapps.com

title: Its not a app

author: Mark Davis
comment: Love it, these designs are so good I brought all of them. Hope this one won't eat my battery to bits...lol keep up the great work guys..will recommend to anyone! ;) maybe add 12hr function to main clock just a thought, would also look cool.. very happy so far very impressed.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content:
Thanks Mark!
The darker metal texture in version 1.2 is less demanding in screen brightness.
That should save few percent off the battery bill.
12h function is available as of 2.1. Enjoy!

title: Ace design

author: Tim Reeb
comment: What would be cool, and I have no idea if this is even possible, would be to have destination time set to say, an upcoming alarm or reminder. Or maybe give the option to set a custom time?

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content:
We are trying to keep all settings in-watch.
So for now the objective is to release user defined timezone, but no actual reminder per say.

title: Liking it so far.

author: Stuart Lathrop
comment: Like Tim, I would love the ability to control the destination clock. If nothing else, could it track an alternate time zone? Keep up the good work!

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Thanks! The customizable timezone has been added in 2.0 . Have at it!

title: A great start!

comment: Im really glad this face dash of the delorean looks and appears just as the actual or close to it... If anyone  buys this it also has a seondary face of the flux capacitor if battery saver is activated in settings... Cant stop staring its great.... Thanks to all developers ....
How do I find the cog to set the time? I tried pressing but nothing happens. How do I get it to work?

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Press and hold the face for few seconds. The face should zoom out and the cog will show at the bottom of the screen.

author: Timothy Lane
comment: Didn't show up on Android Wear. Couldn't use the watch face. Got a refund from Google.
